text: "Tu Robaste Mi Corazón" () is a duet by Mexican-American singers Selena and Emilio Navaira. "Tu Robaste Mi Corazon" was the third and last single from Selena Live! (1993). In Siempre Selena (1996), the male parts of the song were performed by Pete Astudillo. The song peaked at number five on the Hot Latin Tracks, number six on the Latin Pop Airplay and number eight on the Latin Regional Mexican Airplay charts. == Charts == Chart (1993) Peak position US Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 5 US Billboard Latin Regional Mexican Airplay 8 US Billboard Latin Pop Airplay 6 == References == Category:Selena songs Category:1993 songs Category:Songs written by A.B. Quintanilla Category:Songs in Spanish
title: Tú Robaste Mi Corazón
